thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 10 of 1811
thread.title: Vicki(Heather)

author: Vicki(Heather)
title: Vicki(Heather)
text: Well I don't usually give a review but this is one of my first.... Well my experience with flight hub has been a good one. I always use to book right through the airlines for all my ticket purchases. However, I have had nothing but good experiences through flighthub.com that I have not just used them once, twice but three times in the past year. Thank you flighthub.com you have mad my travelling a much better booking and travel experience!!!
